page.title: 02DIET IN CARMARTHEN
page.content: We visited the Tesco Supermarket in Carmarthen and interviewed the Manager of the store.The questions asked were about the eating habits of the Carmarthen people. The most popular breakfast cereal was found to be Kelloggs Cornflakes, followed by Wheatabix and Sugar Puffs came third. Of the meats eaten it was found that beef was the favourite followed by poultry,followed by Pork, and then lamb.Out of the fruits the most popular were apples followed by oranges and bananas. The most popular beverage is tea, but the gap between coffee and tea is getting less.Of the vegetables the most popular are peas then carrots followed by sweetcorn.
